nodes.text: Malola was the star of the Outer Rim Territories' Mygeeto system in the Albarrio sector, and was orbited by the planet Mygeeto. Malola was situated at grid square K-5 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

Malola was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the forty-fifth issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around November 11, 2015. Malola was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
